verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:5
verses.text: Go and tell my servant David, Thus saith the Lord, Shalt thou build me an house for me to dwell in?

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:6
verses.text: Whereas I have not dwelt in any house since the time that I brought up the children of Israel out of Egypt, even to this day, but have walked in a tent and in a tabernacle.

verses.name: 2 Samuel 7:7
verses.text: In all the places wherein I have walked with all the children of Israel spake I a word with any of the tribes of Israel, whom I commanded to feed my people Israel, saying, Why build ye not me an house of cedar?
